com.norconex.collector.http.data

Class HttpCrawlData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.norconex.collector.core.data.BaseCrawlData
      • com.norconex.collector.http.data.HttpCrawlData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICrawlData, Serializable, Cloneable

    public class HttpCrawlData
extends BaseCrawlData
    A URL being crawled holding relevant crawl information.
    Author:
    Pascal Essiembre
